July 23, 1957
Mr* Robert E* Dawson, Research Associate
William James Giese and Associates
Twenty Borth Wacker Drive
Chicago 6, Illinois
Dear Mr* Dawson:
Reference is made to your letter of July 22 addressed
to Dr* Harry J* Skomla, who is out of the office
until the end of the month*
I believe that the information contained in our educa¬
tional TV Pact Sheets might be helpful to you in the
study you are conducting. These Pact Sheets, of which
I am enclosing a sample and an index, are published
periodically on an irregular basis and are obtainable
at a subscription rate of #2*50 per year. This ser¬
vice was instituted in 1955 and complete sets of Pact
Sheets issued in 1955 and 195& are available at the
regular subscription rate* Should you desire to sub¬
scribe to those being issued currently, we will send
you those Issued since January 1, 1957, and add your
name to the mailing list to receive those issued during
the balance of the year*
Sincerely,
HEH/jrl
Harold E. Hill
Associate Director
